title: Poster, "76 Jefferson"
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink across UC: 76 Jefferson: Work by artists who lived at 76 Jefferson Street[...] artistic activity of the 60s and 70s evolved./ Fall Penthouse exhibition, September 11 through December 1,/Art Lending Service, 6th Floor, The Museum of Modern Art./Exhibition made possible by agrant from Harvey's Bristol Cream. Imprinted in brown ink at UR: Jefferson;across C in green, blue, brown, and white ink: 76; in black ink at lower margin:Design:Arnold Saks Associates. by a grant from Harveys Bristol Cream; in brown ink at upper right: Jefferson; across center and lower center in green, blue, brown, and white ink:76; in black ink at lower margin: Design:Arnold Saks Associates.
